mapper.select: SELECT REPLACE(g.sgg_nm, CONCAT(s.sd_nm, ' '), '') AS sgg_nm, g.sgg_cd, ST_AsText(ST_Transform(ST_Centroid(g.geom), 4326)) AS geom FROM tl_sgg g JOIN tl_sd s ON (s.sd_nm = g.sd_nm) WHERE s.sd_cd = #{sdValue};
SELECT DISTINCT b.bjd_nm, b.bjd_cd FROM tl_bjd b JOIN tl_sgg c ON b.sgg_cd = c.sgg_cd WHERE c.sgg_cd = #{sggValue};
SELECT sgg_nm, sgg_cd FROM tl_sgg WHERE sd_nm = #{sdValue};
SELECT DISTINCT b.bjd_nm, b.bjd_cd FROM tl_bjd b JOIN tl_sgg c ON b.sgg_cd = c.sgg_cd WHERE c.sgg_cd = #{sggValue};
